task.title: Exporting a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: Export a pipeline when you want to use the pipeline with another . You might also export pipelines to keep a backup.

context.p: When you export a pipeline, the generates a JSON file named after the pipeline as follows: <pipeline name>.json.

step.cmd: In the Pipeline library, click the Actions icon for the pipeline that you want to export.

step.stepresult: The window generates the JSON file and saves it to your default downloads directory.
